title: CPU Components Quiz - OCR A-Level Computer Science

questions.question: Which component of the CPU is responsible for carrying out arithmetic and logical operations?
What does the Control Unit (CU) do in the CPU?
options: Fetches, decodes, and manages execution of instructions

questions.question: Which part of the CPU stores data temporarily while instructions are being processed?
What is the purpose of the CPU Cache?
options: To speed up access to frequently used data
To regulate the speed of CPU operations
To connect CPU to other hardware

questions.question: Which bus transports data between the CPU and other devices/components?
What does the Program Counter (PC) register do?
options: Keeps track of the next instruction address
Controls the data flow in the CPU

questions.question: Which register temporarily holds data fetched from memory?
What role does the Accumulator have in the CPU?
options: Holds results of arithmetic and logic operations

questions.question: Which register contains the address in memory for the next instruction to be fetched?
The Fetch-Decode-Execute cycle is managed primarily by which CPU component?
